00027 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00028 #ifndef __ADC_GROUP_H
00029 #define __ADC_GROUP_H
00030 
00031 #ifdef __cplusplus
00032  extern "C" {
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 
00036 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 #define ENABLE_DEBUG_PRINTF           (1)
00038 #define ENABLE_DEBUG_IO               (1)
00039 
00040 #define ADC_GROUP_TRIGGER_MODE        (0)   /* 0: Trigger by software,  1: Trigger by Timer                 */
00041 #define ADC_GROUP_DATA_MODE           (0)   /* 0: Move ADC data by CPU, 1: Move ADC data by PDMA            */
00042 
00043 #define ADC_GROUP_LIST_LENGTH         (4)   // Same length of two group, the PDMA setting is more easy
00044 
00045 #define ADC_GROUP1_LIST0              (ADC_CH_0)
00046 #define ADC_GROUP1_LIST1              (ADC_CH_1)
00047 #define ADC_GROUP1_LIST2              (ADC_CH_2)
00048 #define ADC_GROUP1_LIST3              (ADC_CH_3)
00049 #if !defined(USE_HT32F50020_30)
00050 #define ADC_GROUP1_LIST4              (0)
00051 #define ADC_GROUP1_LIST5              (0)
00052 #define ADC_GROUP1_LIST6              (0)
00053 #define ADC_GROUP1_LIST7              (0)
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 #define ADC_GROUP2_LIST0              (ADC_CH_4)
00057 #define ADC_GROUP2_LIST1              (ADC_CH_5)
00058 #define ADC_GROUP2_LIST2              (ADC_CH_6)
00059 #define ADC_GROUP2_LIST3              (ADC_CH_7)
00060 #if !defined(USE_HT32F50020_30)
00061 #define ADC_GROUP2_LIST4              (0)
00062 #define ADC_GROUP2_LIST5              (0)
00063 #define ADC_GROUP2_LIST6              (0)
00064 #define ADC_GROUP2_LIST7              (0)
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 // You shall change the Trigger source to meet your condition, and modify the TM_Configuration()
00068 #define ADC_TRIGGER_TM_SOURCE         (ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH0O)
00069 
00070 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00071 #define ADC_GROUP_TRIGGER_MODE_SW     (0)
00072 #define ADC_GROUP_TRIGGER_MODE_TM     (1)
00073 #define ADC_GROUP_DATA_MODE_CPU       (0)
00074 #define ADC_GROUP_DATA_MODE_DMA       (1)
00075 
00076 #define ADC_GROUP_FINISH              (2)
00077 
00078 /* Exported macro ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00079 #if (LIBCFG_PDMA == 0) && (ADC_GROUP_DATA_MODE == 1)
00080   #error "The device you selected did not support PDMA!"
00081 #endif
00082 
00083 /* Exported variables --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00084 extern vu32 uADCGroupState;           // 0: Stop, 1: Group1, 2:Group2
00085 extern vu32 uADCGroupFinish;          // 0: Not finish, 2: Finished
00086 
00087 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00088 void ADC_GroupProcess(void);
00089 
00090 #ifdef __cplusplus
00091 }
00092 #endif
00093 
00094 #endif
